entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 06:34 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 103.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Rain mixed with snow early this morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
